text: Nokuda kwaizvozvo, takave tinotsindikidzira vana vaIzirairi kuti kana pane anenge auraya munhu kunze kwokuti murango wehumhondi, kana kukonzeresa zvakaipa munyika, zvinoita sokunge auraya vanhu vese, uye kana pane abatsira munhu (apa hupenyu), zvinoita sokunge abatsira (apa hupenyu) vanhu vose. Uye zvirokwazvo kwakakuya vatumwa vedu kwavari nemicherechedzo yakajeka. Asi zvirokwazvo vazhinji vavo mushure mezvo vakaenderera mberi nekupfuudzira mwero munyika
